totalcross.net

Class URI

  • totalcross.lang.Object
    • totalcross.net.URI

  • public class URI
extends totalcross.lang.Object
    An URI represents a Uniform Resource Identifier, or an address of something in the Internet.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  URI.Path
      Used as the path component of this URI.
